properties.title: Fulcrum YAAFI Avalon Container Service Lifecycle
properties.author: Siegfried Goeschl

section.name: Decommision
section.p:
The decommision of a service covers the shutdown procedure a service
Startable.stop()
Disposable.dispose()
Finalizer

subsection.name: Startable.stop()
subsection.p: Stop all of the service activities since it is guaranteed that no client will invoke the service.

subsection.name: Disposable.dispose()
subsection.p: Free all resources hold by the service implementation.

subsection.name: Finalizer
subsection.p: Well, it might be never called but all resouces have been released before.
